summary: This document contains resolutions from a Limited Liability Company (LLC) authorizing Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas to act as a depositary, custodian, or investment advisor for the company. It outlines the powers granted to authorized signers for managing accounts and the indemnification of the bank for actions taken under these resolutions.
keyFacts: The document is a Certificate of Limited Liability Company Resolutions for an unnamed LLC.
Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas is designated as the depositary, custodian, or investment advisor for the LLC.
The document outlines the authority of authorized signers to manage accounts and execute agreements.
There are provisions for indemnifying the bank against claims related to actions taken by authorized signers.
The document emphasizes that no one other than the company has an interest in the accounts opened in the company's name.
